segments.text: Shall we discuss the packing ? You know , a well-designed package helps sell the goods , so the products must not only be superior in quality , but also attractive in appearance . I'd like to see the sample of packing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have made a lot of improvement in packing . You are welcome to see the sample in the showroom . I think you will find the new packing beautiful and quite well-done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Quite good . The beautiful design and bright color are just the European taste . How are you gonna pack these blouses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to pack them in boxes with a colored picture of the blouse on it . Inside we â€™ ll use a transparent poly bag for the blouse ready for the window show . You'll see that the blouses will appeal to the eye as well as to the purse .
segments.speaker: S2
